content: परिणी {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To lead or carry round (the fire); तौ दंपती त्रिः परिणीय वह्निं (पुरोधाः) <ls>Ku. 7. 80</ls>; अग्निं पर्यणयं च यत् <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--2@} To marry, espouse; परिणेष्यति पार्वतीं यदा तपसा तत्प्रवणीकृतो हरः <ls>Ku. 4. 42.</ls> {@--3@} To ascertain, investigate; <ls>Ms. 7. 122.</ls> {@--4@} To lead forward. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To pass, spend (time).
